sentence.Network_en: He was saucy and mischievous when he was working.
sentence.Network_cn: 他工作时总爱调皮捣蛋.

sentence.Network_en: She is a saucy little miss!
His daughter is a saucy tomboy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他女儿是一个调皮的假小子.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 星那歌呗_互动百科 ... T——tender（ 温柔） S——saucy（ 漂亮的） U——uncontrolled（ 自由的，无拘束的）.
六级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... saucer n. 茶托，浅碟 saucy a. 傲慢的,莽撞的,活泼的,漂亮的 savour n. 滋味,气味,食欲.
cedic19 &laquo; dream_nimin131_wordpress_blog ... 壳壳/ shell/ 俏皮俏皮/ saucy/ 切换切换/ to cut over/.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... saucer 小碟子 saucy 俏皮的 sausage 香肠.

list.abs: The saucy child protruded her tongue ., 这无礼的孩子伸出了她的舌头.
she wore a saucy new hat ., 她戴着一顶漂亮的新帽子.
隔天，中央新闻社又收到一封明信片，内文同样以红墨水写成。信里，写信者自称是“调皮的杰克”（saucy Jacky），并提到他打算“隔天再干两件事”——一般认为是凌晨伊丽莎白·史泰德和凯萨琳·艾道斯这两起命案。另外，.
She is a saucy miss ., 她是个莽撞的女孩.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (in the sense 'savoury, flavoured with sauce'): from sauce + -y

entry.tran: 开色情玩笑的;性幽默的;不雅的
entry.def: Someone or something that is saucy refers to sex in a light-hearted, amusing way.

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by a lightly pert and exuberant quality;

sentences.sentence: "a certain irreverent gaiety and ease of manner"
"impertinent of a child to lecture a grownup"
"an impudent boy given to insulting strangers"
